title: Can Cyber and Florucinolone other antibiotics cause irreversible damage to Tyndon?
subtitle: Although the potential risks are still rare, they are large enough for the Food and Drug Administration to suggest limiting the use of these drugs to absolute necessity.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Forestry Development Authority updated its warnings - and recommended restrictions - on the description of a group of antibiotics called Floroxinolone, citing potentially irreversible side effects, including damage and tearing of strings.
